databases.title: Develop your databases instead of worrying about them.
databases.subtitle: With our fully managed databases, free yourself from administrative constraints and focus on your applications and products.
databases.description1: SQL, NoSQL or caching: we have the solution. Deploy your preferred database engine in minutes with our range of managed solutions: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB and Valkey.
databases.description2: Our teams manage the infrastructure, backups and monitoring so you can focus on developing high-performance applications, not on server maintenance.
databases.description3: Plus, start small and scale easily as your data grows, all with predictable pricing, data sovereignty and built-in high availability.
databases.tile.quickStart.title: Quick Start
databases.tile.quickStart.content: Find all the guides and tutorials for our managed databases
databases.tile.documentation.title: Documentation & tutorials
databases.tile.documentation.content: Learn how to quickly deploy your first managed database.
databases.tile.freeTier.title: MongoDB Free Tier
databases.tile.freeTier.content: Get your first managed MongoDB cluster free for life.
databases.tile.freeTier.cta: Create your MongoDB instance in two clicks
analytics.title: Turn your data into actionable insights, not sources of problems.
analytics.subtitle: With our fully managed analytics engines, free yourself from administrative constraints and focus on your applications and products.
analytics.description1: Analyse, search and monitor your data at scale, without managing complex infrastructure.
analytics.description2: Deploy Kafka, ClickHouse, OpenSearch and Grafana in minutes to optimise your data flows, analytics and observability workloads.
analytics.description3: From dashboards to data pipelines, gain visibility and performance while maintaining full control and data sovereignty.
analytics.tile.quickStart.title: Quick Start
analytics.tile.quickStart.content: Learn how to quickly deploy your managed pipelines and dashboards.
analytics.tile.documentation.title: Documentation and tutorials
analytics.tile.documentation.content: Find all the guides and tutorials for our managed Analytics engines
analytics.tile.integrations.title: Integrations
analytics.tile.integrations.content: Easily connect with your databases, Object Storage, or Kubernetes clusters.
